overview: The protagonist learns that soon she will have to leave her blockhouse flat for good. After receiving the upsetting news she is overwhelmed with emotions. Her teardrop of farewell grows into a concrete monolith. When the drop hits the ground a surreal panorama of the blockhouse area, that she used to call home, unfolds...

production_companies.name: Moholy-Nagy University of Art and Design

title: Bye Little Block!
